input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is HPSEActor

NOTE: Any text containing spaces should be provided in quotes. For ex. "Some text" 1. Adds top-level elements to an organization. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>add</command> <category>security</category> <process-id>update-organization</process-id> <command-arguments> <organization-id>1029</organization-id> <application-ids>1305</application-ids> <host-ids>1305</host-ids> <childorganization-ids>1161</childorganization-ids> <switch-ids>1305</switch-ids> <storagesystem-ids>1305</storagesystem-ids> <tapelibrary-ids>1305</tapelibrary-ids> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. organization-id[Required] id of the organization that is being searched here. application-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of applications to be added. host-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of hosts to be added. childorganization-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of childorganizations to be added. switch-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of switches to be added. storagesystem-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of storagesystems to be added. tapelibrary-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of tapelibraries to be added.
NOTE: Atleast one of application-ids,host-ids,switch-ids,storagesystem-ids,tapelibrary-ids should be provided
2. Removes top-level elements to an organization. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>remove</command> <category>security</category> <process-id>update-organization</process-id> <command-arguments> <organization-id>1029</organization-id> <application-ids>1305</application-ids> <host-ids>1305</host-ids> <childorganization-ids>1161</childorganization-ids> <switch-ids>1305</switch-ids> <storagesystem-ids>1305</storagesystem-ids> <tapelibrary-ids>1305</tapelibrary-ids> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. organization-id[Required] id of the organization that is being searched here. application-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of applications to be added. host-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of hosts to be added. childorganization-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of childorganizations to be added. switch-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of switches to be added. storagesystem-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of storagesystems to be added. tapelibrary-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of tapelibraries to be added.
NOTE: Atleast one of application-ids,host-ids,switch-ids,storagesystem-ids,tapelibrary-ids should be provided
3. Sets the organization name and description, and also replaces the top-level and sub-elements in the organization. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>set</command> <category>security</category> <process-id>update-organization</process-id> <command-arguments> <organization-id>1029</organization-id> <name>"Some name"</name> <description>"Some description"</description> <application-ids>1305</application-ids> <host-ids>1305</host-ids> <switch-ids>1305</switch-ids> <storagesystem-ids>1305</storagesystem-ids> <tapelibrary-ids>1305</tapelibrary-ids> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. name[Optional] New name of the organization description[Optional] New description of the organization organization-id[Required] id of the organization that is being searched here. application-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of applications to be added. host-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of hosts to be added. switch-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of switches to be added. storagesystem-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of storagesystems to be added. tapelibrary-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of tapelibraries to be added.
NOTE: Atleast one of name,description,application-ids,host-ids,switch-ids,storagesystem-ids,tapelibrary-ids should be provided

documentation.description:
This wrapper supports the following requirements:-
1. Adds top-level elements to an organization. 2. Removes top level elements in a organization. 3. Sets the organization name and description, and also replaces the top-level and sub-elements in the organization.
